source:
**Opportunity Data load**

This notebook loads data to deltalake table etlhubconfirmed.dht_market by sourceing data from ESA Kyndryl.
Since ESA is not accessible from Azure, a datastage job srcESA_Opportunity_Azure is executed on datastage to push the ESA extract to adls.
Import all the necessary libraries

from azure.storage.blob import BlobClient
import pandas as pd
from io import StringIO
from pyspark.sql.functions import md5, concat_ws,trim
from sqlite3 import connect
from pyspark.sql import functions as F
#conn = connect(':memory:')
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession 
from pyspark.sql.functions import col
from pyspark.sql.types import * 
from delta.tables import *
import os
import sys
from datetime import datetime
Define Parameters

account_name = 'adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast' # fill in your primary account name 
container_name = 'etlhubfilestorage' # fill in your container name 
relative_path = 'extract/ESA/' # fill in your relative folder path 
relative_archive_path='archive/'
file_name='DS_OPPORTUNITY_DATA_UPD.csv'  
natural_key="OPPORTUNITY_NUM"
tablename="etlhubConfirmed.dht_opportunity"
stagingtable="DHTS_OPPORTUNITY"
keycolumn="OPPORTUNITY_KEY"
date = datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d-%I:%M:%S_%p")
print(date)
Copy source CSV file to archive folder including timestamp in file name
#Read data from adls csv file extracted from source at
https://adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.dfs.core.windows.net/etlhubfilestorage/extract/ESA/DS_SALES_STAGE_DATA.csv

adls_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name, account_name, relative_path) 
print('Primary storage account path: ' + adls_path) 

adls_arch_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name, account_name, relative_archive_path) 
print('Primary storage account path: ' + adls_path) 

relative_archive_path
# Read a csv file 
csv_path = adls_path + file_name
arch_fil_name=file_name.rsplit(".")
csv_archive_path = adls_arch_path + arch_fil_name[0] + '_' + date + '.' + arch_fil_name[1]
print (csv_archive_path)
incrementalData_DF = spark.read.load(csv_path,format="csv", sep="||", header="true")
#incrementalData_DF.show()
incrementalData_DF.write.csv(csv_archive_path, header = 'true')
# Get column list for creating Rec_Checksum

col_list=[]
for i in incrementalData_DF.columns:
    col_list.append(i)

# Add a checsum column to help identify the changed rows
print(col_list)
incrementalData_SDF1 = incrementalData_DF.withColumn("nk_hash",md5(natural_key))
incrementalData_DF2 = incrementalData_SDF1.withColumn("column_hash", md5(concat_ws("", *col_list)))
incrementalData_DF2.createOrReplaceTempView("incrementalData_DF2")

#Create a dataframe with target deltalake table data with necessary columns

existingDataDF=spark.sql("SELECT * FROM {}  WHERE CURRENT_IND='Y'".format(tablename))

existingMaxKeyDF=spark.sql("SELECT MAX({}) existing_MAX_KEY from {} WHERE CURRENT_IND='Y'".format(keycolumn,tablename))

# prefix all columns from target table with 'existing_'. This will help to differentiate columns when incremental and existing DF's are joined

existingDataDF1 = existingDataDF.select([F.col(c).alias('existing_'+c) for c in existingDataDF.columns])

existingDataDF1.createOrReplaceTempView('existingDataDF1')

fullJoin1=incrementalData_DF2.join(existingDataDF1, col(natural_key) == col("existing_" + natural_key), "fullouter")

fullJoin2=fullJoin1.join(existingMaxKeyDF,None,"CROSS")

fullJoin2.createOrReplaceTempView('fullJoin')

fullJoin2.write \
  .format("delta") \
  .mode("overwrite") \
  .option("overwriteSchema", "true") \
  .option("path", "abfss://etlhubfilestorage@adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.dfs.core.windows.net/deltalake/staging/{}".format(stagingtable)) \
  .saveAsTable(stagingtable)
   #.option("overwriteSchema", "true") \  .save("") \

Data Validation Checks :

- Check for duplicates in Source data based on natural key
- Check for duplicates in target delta lake table based on natural key

qry3="""
SELECT COUNT(*) as CNT, {} FROM incrementalData_DF2 GROUP BY {} HAVING COUNT(*)>1
;
"""

qry4="""
SELECT COUNT(*) as CNT, {} FROM {} WHERE CURRENT_IND='Y' GROUP BY {} HAVING COUNT(*)>1
;
"""

df3=spark.sql(qry3.format(natural_key,natural_key))
cnt1=df3.count()

print (cnt1)
if cnt1 == 0:
    print("No Duplicates in source data")
    status = 'success'
else:
    print("Below are the duplicates in source:")
    df3.show()
    status = 'fail'
    #os.abort() this will take the spark cluster also down
    sys.exit(1)
    print("This will not be printed")

df4=spark.sql(qry4.format(natural_key,tablename,natural_key))
cnt2=df4.count()

print (cnt2)
if cnt2 == 0:
    print("no duplicates in target delta lake table")
    status = 'success'
else:
    print("Below are the duplicates in target delta lake table:")
    df4.show()
    status = 'fail'
    #os.abort() this will take the spark cluster also down
    sys.exit(2)
    print("This will not be printed")

#Below code can be used to evaluate if the DMLs are successful or not Exception handling purpose

qry_4_recon1="""

SELECT COUNT(*) from {} A 
WHERE existing_REC_CHECKSUM is null
AND NOT EXISTS
(SELECT 1 FROM {} B
WHERE A.{}=B.{}
and b.CURRENT_IND='Y'
AND A.column_hash=B.REC_CHECKSUM)

"""
df_4_recon1=spark.sql(qry_4_recon1.format(stagingtable,tablename,natural_key,natural_key))
print('New records or Inserts are:') 
df_4_recon1.show()

qry_4_recon2="""

SELECT COUNT(*) from {} A 
WHERE LOWER({}) = LOWER(existing_{}) 
and LOWER(column_hash) <> LOWER(existing_rec_checksum)
AND NOT EXISTS
(SELECT 1 FROM {} B
WHERE LOWER(A.{})=LOWER(B.{})
and b.CURRENT_IND='Y'
AND A.column_hash=B.REC_CHECKSUM
)
;

"""
df_4_recon2=spark.sql(qry_4_recon2.format(stagingtable,natural_key,natural_key,tablename,natural_key,natural_key))
print('Changed records or Updates are:') 
df_4_recon2.show()

qry_4_recon3="""
SELECT COUNT(*) from 
{} A
join fullJoin B
ON A.{} = B.existing_{}
AND B.{} is NULL
AND A.CURRENT_IND='Y' AND A.ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND='Y' 
AND A.REC_START_DT=b.existing_REC_START_DT

"""

df_4_recon3=spark.sql(qry_4_recon3.format(tablename,natural_key,natural_key,natural_key))
print('Soft Deletes are:') 
df_4_recon3.show()
%%sql
SELECT count(*) FROM etlhubconfirmed.dht_opportunity where current_ind='Y'

%%sql
select 
	* 
    from dhts_opportunity A 
WHERE existing_REC_CHECKSUM is null

#Insert for New rows which are missing in target and present in source based on Natural Key.

qry_4_recon1="""
SELECT COUNT(*) from {} A 
WHERE existing_REC_CHECKSUM is null
AND NOT EXISTS
(SELECT 1 FROM {} B
WHERE A.{}=B.{}
and b.CURRENT_IND='Y'
AND A.column_hash=B.REC_CHECKSUM)

"""
df_4_recon1=spark.sql(qry_4_recon1.format(stagingtable, tablename, natural_key, natural_key))

qry_ins_new_rows="""

INSERT INTO {}
	select 
	COALESCE(A.existing_MAX_KEY,0) + ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY 1) AS {},1 as SALES_STAGE_VERSION 
    ,SALES_STAGE_CD
	,SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME
	,SSM_STEP_NO
	,SSM_STEP_NAME
	,'Y' AS CURRENT_IND
	,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS EXTRACT_DT
	,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REC_START_DT
	,'9999-12-31 00:00:00.000' as REC_END_DT
	,'ESA' AS SOURCE_SYSTEM
	,column_hash as REC_CHECKSUM
	,'I' as REC_STATUS
	,current_timestamp as IMG_LST_UPD_DT
	,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IMG_CREATED_DT
	,'ED' AS DATA_IND
	,'Y' AS ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND 
    from {} A 
WHERE existing_REC_CHECKSUM is null
AND NOT EXISTS
(SELECT 1 FROM {} B
WHERE A.{}=B.{}
and b.CURRENT_IND='Y'
AND A.column_hash=B.REC_CHECKSUM)
;
"""

d=spark.sql(qry_ins_new_rows.format(tablename,keycolumn,stagingtable,tablename,natural_key, natural_key ))
%%sql
SELECT * from etlhubconfirmed.dht_sales_stage

#Update or expire the rows with existing instance of the changed rows:
qry_4_upd_changes_rows="""

MERGE INTO {} A
USING {} B
ON A.{} = B.{}
AND LOWER(B.{}) = LOWER(B.existing_{}) 
and LOWER(B.column_hash) <> LOWER(B.existing_rec_checksum)
AND A.CURRENT_IND='Y' AND A.REC_START_DT=b.existing_REC_START_DT
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CURRENT_IND='N'
    ,REC_END_DT= existing_REC_START_DT -  INTERVAL 5 seconds --current_timestamp --existing_REC_START_DT-1
    ,IMG_LST_UPD_DT=current_timestamp
;
"""
f=spark.sql(qry_4_upd_changes_rows.format(tablename,stagingtable,natural_key,natural_key,natural_key,natural_key))

%%sql
--existing data
select 'existing data',count(*) from DHTS_SALES_STAGE where existing_CURRENT_IND='Y';
  
select 'rows for Update', count(*)
from etlhubConfirmed.dht_sales_stage B
join
DHTS_SALES_STAGE A 
WHERE A.SALES_STAGE_CD = B.SALES_STAGE_CD
and LOWER(A.SALES_STAGE_CD) = LOWER(A.existing_SALES_STAGE_CD) 
and LOWER(column_hash) <> LOWER(existing_rec_checksum)
AND B.REC_START_DT=A.existing_REC_START_DT
AND NOT EXISTS
(SELECT 1 FROM etlhubConfirmed.DHT_SALES_STAGE B
WHERE LOWER(A.SALES_STAGE_CD)=LOWER(B.SALES_STAGE_CD)
and b.CURRENT_IND='Y'
AND A.column_hash=B.REC_CHECKSUM
)
;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM etlhubConfirmed.DHT_SALES_STAGE A
JOIN DHTS_SALES_STAGE B
ON A.SALES_STAGE_CD = B.SALES_STAGE_CD
AND LOWER(B.SALES_STAGE_CD) = LOWER(B.existing_SALES_STAGE_CD) 
and LOWER(B.column_hash) <> LOWER(B.existing_rec_checksum)
AND A.CURRENT_IND='Y' AND A.REC_START_DT=b.existing_REC_START_DT

#Insert for changed rows which are missing in target and present in source based on Natural Key.

qry_ins_changed_rows="""
INSERT INTO {}
	select 
    existing_SALES_STAGE_KEY
    ,1 + existing_SALES_STAGE_VERSION as SALES_STAGE_VERSION
    ,SALES_STAGE_CD
	,SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME
	,SSM_STEP_NO
	,SSM_STEP_NAME
	,'Y' AS CURRENT_IND
	,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS EXTRACT_DT
	,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REC_START_DT
	,'9999-12-31 00:00:00.000' as REC_END_DT
	,'ESA' AS SOURCE_SYSTEM	
	,column_hash as REC_CHECKSUM
	,'U' as REC_STATUS
	,current_timestamp as IMG_LST_UPD_DT
	,existing_IMG_CREATED_DT AS IMG_CREATED_DT
	,'ED' AS DATA_IND
	,'Y' AS ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND 
from {} A 
WHERE LOWER({}) = LOWER(existing_{}) 
and LOWER(column_hash) <> LOWER(existing_rec_checksum)
AND NOT EXISTS
(SELECT 1 FROM {} B
WHERE LOWER(A.{})=LOWER(B.{})
and b.CURRENT_IND='Y'
AND A.column_hash=B.REC_CHECKSUM
)
;
"""

e=spark.sql(qry_ins_changed_rows.format(tablename,stagingtable,natural_key,natural_key,tablename,natural_key,natural_key))

#Soft Deletes - Update Active_Ind for the rows no longer active in source:

qry_4_upd_deleted_rows="""

MERGE INTO {} A
USING {} B
ON A.{} = B.existing_{}
AND B.{} is NULL
AND A.CURRENT_IND='Y' AND A.ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND='Y' 
AND A.REC_START_DT=b.existing_REC_START_DT
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND='N'
    ,IMG_LST_UPD_DT=current_timestamp

;
"""
g=spark.sql(qry_4_upd_deleted_rows.format(tablename,stagingtable,natural_key,natural_key,natural_key))

%%sql
select 'Number of Active Rows' as Title,count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_sales_stage where CURRENT_IND='Y'
;


select 'Duplicate Rows based on surrogate key' as Title,sales_stage_key,count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_sales_stage where CURRENT_IND='Y'
    group by sales_stage_key
    having count(*)>1
;

select 'Duplicate Rows based on natural key' as Title,SALES_STAGE_CD,count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_sales_stage where CURRENT_IND='Y'
    group by SALES_STAGE_CD
    having count(*)>1
;

select 'New rows inserted in this run' as Title,count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_sales_stage where CURRENT_IND='Y'
    and date(extract_dt)=current_date and rec_status='I'
;

select 'Changed rows inserted in this run' as Title,count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_sales_stage where CURRENT_IND='Y'
    and date(extract_dt)=current_date and rec_status='U'
;

select 'Changed rows updated in this run' as Title,count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_sales_stage where CURRENT_IND='N'
    and date(REC_END_DT)=current_date --and rec_status='I'
;

select 'Rows no longer active in source' as Title,count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_sales_stage where CURRENT_IND='Y'
    AND 
     date(REC_END_DT)=current_date --and rec_status='I'
;

%%sql
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM etlhubconfirmed.dht_sales_stage
WHERE CURRENT_IND='N' and DATE(REC_END_DT)<>'9999-12-31'
    and date(img_lst_upd_dt)=current_date
        limit 1
;


select count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_sales_stage where CURRENT_IND='Y'
   and date(extract_dt)=current_date --and rec_status='I'
;

select count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_sales_stage
WHERE ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND='N'
    and date(IMG_LST_UPD_DT)=current_date
    ;
UPDATE etlhubconfirmed.dht_sales_stage
set CURRENT_IND='Y', 
REC_END_DT='9999-12-31'
  WHERE CURRENT_IND='N' and DATE(REC_END_DT)<>'9999-12-31'
    and date(img_lst_upd_dt)=current_date
